statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-12 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 16 \, x + 28 , 5 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 4 , -3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 5 , 2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
